Method Detail

isNewsResult

public static NewsResult isNewsResult(Result result)

getClusterUrl

public java.lang.String getClusterUrl()
When a news result has a set of related stories, this URL is available and non-null. In this situation, the URL points to a landing page that points to all of the related stories.

Returns:
a landing page that points to all of the related stories (or null).

getContent

public java.lang.String getContent()
Returns a snippet of content from the news story associated with this search result.

Returns:
a snippet of content from the news story associated with this search result.

getImage

public NewsResult.Image getImage()
This property is optional. It only appears in a result when the system has determined that there is a good image that represents the cluster of news articles related to this result. It's important to note the the image relates to the cluster of news articles, not just the article that acts as the primary article for this result. Given this, it's very important for your related user interface to not mis-represent the image. You must always display the news source of the article, and the news source of the image as they are often different. You will notice that on Google News, the image is displayed off to the side with full attribution to the source, and that it's hyper-linked to the article associated with the image, not the article associated with the current result. This property is optional. It does not always exist. It's best to check for null before using. When the property is present, it contains the following sub-properties.

Returns:
NewsResult.Image or null if none was provided

getLocation

public java.lang.String getLocation()
Returns the location of the news story. This is a list of locations in most specific to least specific order where the components are separated by ",". Note, there may only be one element in the list... A typical value for this property is "Edinburgh,Scotland,UK" or possibly "USA".

Returns:
the location of the news story.

getPublishedDate

public java.util.Date getPublishedDate()
Returns the published date (RFC-822 format) of the news story referenced by this search result.

Returns:
the published date (RFC-822 format) of the news story referenced by this search result.

getPublisher

public java.lang.String getPublisher()
Returns the name of the publisher of the news story.

Returns:
the name of the publisher of the news story.

getRelatedStories

public com.google.gwt.core.client.JsArray<NewsResult.RelatedStory> getRelatedStories()
A List of NewsResult.RelatedStory. It is only populated in a result when the story also has a set of closely related stories.

Returns:
A List of NewsResult.RelatedStory.

getTitle

public java.lang.String getTitle()
Returns the title of the news story returned as a search result.

Returns:
the title of the news story returned as a search result.

getTitleNoFormatting

public java.lang.String getTitleNoFormatting()
Returns the title, but unlike .title, this property is stripped of html markup (e.g., <b>, <i>, etc.).

Returns:
the title, but unlike .title, this property is stripped of html markup (e.g., <b>, <i>, etc.).

getUnescapedUrl

public java.lang.String getUnescapedUrl()
Returns the raw URL of the result.

Returns:
the raw URL of the result.

getUrl

public java.lang.String getUrl()
Returns an escaped version of the above URL.

Returns:
an escaped version of the above URL.
